OutputFormat.Description: Converts the report data to CSV.
OutputFormat.Name: CSV

Columns.Description: A list (Array) of the columns to be contained in the order in which they should occur in the output result.
Columns.Label: Columns
Columns.Name: Columns

IncludeColumnHeader.Description: Determine if a header containing the column names should be contained. Default: 1 (true).
IncludeColumnHeader.Label: Include Column Headers
IncludeColumnHeader.Name: IncludeColumnHeader

Quote.Description: The quote character to be used. Default: " (Double Quote).
Quote.Label: Quote
Quote.Name: Quote

Separator.Description: The value separator to be used. Default: , (Comma).
Separator.Label: Separator
Separator.Name: Separator

Title.Description: A simple title, contained in the first row/cell of the output result.
Title.Label: Title
Title.Name: Title
